mean_cn: v. 盖住，包括，掩护，通过，占地；  n. 盖子，封面
mean_en: to put something over, on top of, or in front of (something else) especially in order to protect, hide, or close it
deformation_desc: 拉长的C就像一块大布，盖住了下面的over
sentence: I don't use my swimming pool in the winter , so I cover it.
sentence_trans: 冬季我不用游泳池，所以我把它盖上。
